column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Minimum lot depth 150ft. Minimum PUD size 5 acres. There's a 2:1 density bonus for PUDs in this district outside of section 3 (west side of Maple Street; marked on town plan).

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Single-unit homes are allowed by right below 500ft of elevation and by conditional use review above 500ft of elevation. Maximum driveway slope 15%. Development must not disrupt viewshed, must have minimal impact on deer wintering, and must maximize forest block preservation. Minimum PUD lot size 50 acres. Lots must be deep enough to be usable; no 'spaghetti lots'.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: This district consists of FEMA flood map zone A areas.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Minimum lot frontage on Rt 7 400ft; on Plank Rd, South Middlebrook Rd 200ft. Minimum lot depth 275ft. Maximum building size 15,000 sf. Total building footprint maximum 50,000 or 15% lot coverage, whichever is less. Minimum PUD lot size 2.5 acres with architectural, siting, and landscaping requirements. In 4+ unit residences, 1 parking spot must be accessible.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Maximum yard setback 75ft. Minimum lot depth 100ft. This district is subject to a variety of architectural requirements. Density bonus of <=1 unit/0.25 acres for two+ unit housing in PUDs. PUDs must meet affordability requirements if > 3 units. Development is intended to grow with increased sewer & sidewalk infrastructure. In 4+ unit dwellings, at least 1 parking spot must be accessible.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: This overlay layer does not prohibit any activity permitted in the base zoning district. It requires that developers submit a landscape plan and narrative explaining siting and clearing (both with minimal impacts on surrounding forest).

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: This district is comprised of town hall property.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Minimum lot depth 100 ft. In 4+ unit dwellings, at least 1 parking spot must be accessible.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Minimum PUD size 10 acres. Minimum lot depth 150ft.
